verbose_text: Recent study suggest that mitogen activated protein kinase / extracellular signal regulated kinase 1/2 (MEK/ERK1/2) and PI3K / Akt are both activated by heparin binding epidermal growth factor like growth factor and enhance restitution during intestinal IR XREF_BIBR.
evidence:
mitogen-activated protein kinase/extracellular signal-regulated kinase
1/2 (MEK/ERK1/2) and PI3K/Akt are both activated by heparin-binding epidermal growth
factor
